intro.text: Karun is a graduate from Mumbai University having done his B.E. in Information Technology.
He has excellent interpersonal and communication skills demonstrated throughout his academic as well as professional career.

He has a keen interest in analysis (technical and functional) and problem solving. His analytic skills allow him to provide multiple solutions to a given problem and evaluate the best approach for it.
A sound technical person, he has the ability to easily grasp the functional aspects of a project and adapt quickly according to the circumstances.
A positive attitude towards work, pro-activeness along with diligence and discipline has helped him to overcome challenges and succeed in all the tasks undertaken by him.

experience.title: His experience so far features in

summary.body: Through Thoughtworks I provide software development consulting skills to various clients across various domains. Coupled with the software development skills I am also focussed on applying agile and lean principles and practices to the project. I work with varied sized Thoughtworks teams in collaboration with the client teams through the life cycle of the projects.
Work on solutions and applications for the BlobCity database, a high performance No-Query database solution on the cloud.

projects.title: US based Global Credit Card company
body: Leading and developing a solution for the new platform which is a business-critical core for the day to day functioning of the bank's current business as well as to enable them launch future lines of business. The CQRS and event sourced banking platform allows them to manage multiple products and future lines of business on a single highly horizontally scalable system.
Lead the development team managing third party integration through a generic highly available and scalable gateway service.

Also developed other solutions which include developing new features, migrating legacy applications and introducing automation test strategies. The assignment also involved introducing modern tools, frameworks and design paradigms to existing systems.
Worked on a number of engagements which included both on and offsite work where he was responsible to evangelise XP practices.

projects.title: aBCDE: a BlobCity Development Environment
body: Lead Developer for aBCDE (a BlobCity Development Environment) which is a custom package Eclipse IDE which integrates with the BlobCity platform allowing automation and increasing ease of development and deployment from a local environment to the cloud.

projects.title: Solar Rooftop
body: iOS application to help customers move towards the use of photo voltaic panels in order to save electricity. This application provides a quick estimate on the investment required and potential savings based on current electricity usage for a household.

projects.title: Nutriprash
body: Lead Developer and UX Designer for an online shopping website allowing management of products, orders, deliveries, a notification system, billing via multiple payment gateways

projects.title: Enterprise Dispatch GUI Environment
body: Designed and Developed a desktop application for one of the world's leading telecom companies to handle customer tickets and perform workforce management of over 40,000 technicians to enable dispatching them for jobs. This application is built using Java Swing and the Spring Integration framework on IBM's WebSphere servers.
Was a part of the design and development phases along with analysis and writing of the business and system requirements for the application.
